transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Good afternoon, may I speak with Maria Garcia?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hi Maria, this is David Park from First National Collections. I'm calling about your medical bill from Central Hospital. Do you have a few minutes to discuss this?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Oh, yes. I've been meaning to call about that.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: No problem at all. The outstanding balance is $1,345. I want to let you know that you have rights under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, and if you need written verification of this debt, I can send that to you.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Thank you. I remember that bill. Can I set up a payment plan?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Absolutely. We can work with you on that. What amount would be manageable for you each month?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: That works perfectly. I'll set up a 14-month payment plan starting next month. You'll receive written confirmation within 5 business days.
